channel.title: Comments on: Is Bitcoin Dead? Explained

item.title: By: chirao farl
item.dc:creator: chirao farl
item.description: Bitcoin can't be dead. and those famous hater will regret later. This year is another halving event is going to be. btc will fly soon
item.content:encoded:
Bitcoin can’t be dead. and those famous hater will regret later. This year is another halving event is going to be.
btc will fly soon

item.title: By: Anikys3reasure
item.dc:creator: Anikys3reasure
item.description:
How could Bitcoin ever be dead? Bitcoin beats all other financial assets as far as I'm concerned. After this second halving, I wonder what Bitcoin has in stock for holders.
Nice Article!
item.content:encoded:
How could Bitcoin ever be dead? Bitcoin beats all other financial assets as far as I’m concerned. After this second halving, I wonder what Bitcoin has in stock for holders.

Nice Article!

item.title: By: GodRACE
item.dc:creator: GodRACE
item.description: Bitcoin always bounces back. That's why I'm hodling on my Atomicwallet for a long time.
item.content:encoded: Bitcoin always bounces back. That’s why I’m hodling on my Atomicwallet for a long time.
